mapper.update:
update IMOS_PD_CheckPlan
CheckPlan_Code = #{计划编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CheckPlan_Name = #{盘点名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CheckPlan_Way = #{盘点方式, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CheckPlan_Project = #{盘点项目, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CheckPlan_OperatorCode = #{盘点人编号, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CheckPlan_OperatorName = #{盘点人名称, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CheckPlan_StartDate = #{盘点开始时间, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CheckPlan_EndDate = #{盘点结束时间, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CheckPlan_Result = #{完成程度, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where CheckPlan_Code = #{计划编号}

select
from IMOS_PD_CheckPlan where CheckPlan_Code like #{计划编号} and CheckPlan_Result = '未执行'
mapper.update: update IMOS_PD_CheckPlan set CheckPlan_Result = '执行中' ,CheckPlan_StartDate = getdate() where CheckPlan_Code = #{计划编号} and CheckPlan_Result = '未执行'
update IMOS_PD_CheckPlan set CheckPlan_Result = '已完成' ,CheckPlan_EndDate = getdate() where CheckPlan_Result = '执行中'
